title: Charlotte Domingos
description: Charlotte Domingos is a movie director who needed a website to display her late short movie entitled Its almost 8 and her previous works. My mission was to create her brand identity, work with her on the design on the website and develop it.

title: Space traveler
description: A click game created for a school project of 5 persons. It takes place in space where you have to get gems as much as possible to build the spaceship and discover others planets. I was in charge of leading the project and develop it.

title: Sabre France
description: During my internship in at Basaltiq, I had the opportunity to work on a Wordpress project which gave me a solid foundation for building any other Wordpress website.

title: Écritures numériques
description: An on going project working as a project manager for the University of Monteral. The Digital studies Chair of research needs a brand new website, from its visual identity to its deployment.

title: Bananas journey
description: This is a webdoc using Vue.js about the journey of a banana, its impacts on productors, local population, and on our environment. During two weeks and in group of 5, our goal was to sensibilize people about how destructive our way of consumption can be.
imageAlt: Picture of a bananas plantation in Columbia
